sentences.sentence: Capital expenditure was treble the 2002 level.
Thanks to my treble saxophone teacher, Bill Hiner, for giving me a way out of the sea of bitterness.

sentences.sentence: Nashi played fish for many years, but long ago, he might have played treble saxophone in a ballroom band in Istanbul.
sentences.translation: 纳希打了很多年的鱼，但是在很久以前，他也许在伊斯坦布尔的一个舞厅乐队里吹过高音萨克斯管。
